title: Glowbug Alert Notice
description: Information about a Glowbug trigger.  All fields optional; omitted if not available or not applicable.

reporter.description: mission=GLOWBUG, the other fields are not used.

alert_info.description: All fields used. tense='current' for astrphysical triggers or 'planned' for commanded ones (injections)'

event_info.description: event_id=[ 'BUGyymmdd.fff', seqnum ], where fff is in milidays with trailing zeros. id_source=GLOWBUG. event_name is not used.

trigger_time.description: Only trigger_time is used (ISO 6801) with second fraction.

trigger_stats.description: rate_duration is the integration time, over which the rate_snr was measured. Not used: image_snr, image_duration and image_energy_range.

active_detectors.description: Elements 0..11 correspond to the 12 CsI detectors. If present, 12 and 13 correspond to the two CLLB detectos and 15 to the SSA detector.

localization.description: Burst localization in different coordinate systems if applicable. If semi_minor or position_angle are null or missing then semi_major should be interpreted as a radius of the containment contour.

instrumnet.description: ra,dec are TBD angles in the instrument coordinate system.

iss.description: ra,dec are TBD angles in the ISS coordinate system.

instrument_geoloc.description: ra,dec are the longitude,latitude of the instrument location in geocentric (TBD) coordinates.
